game.name: Princesses Christmas Photos Album
game.description:
The most awaited Christmas celebration has just come and your two favorite Disney princesses Elsa and Ariel have decided to make photo album. They actually want to capture the beautiful memories of this grand holiday in a photo album so that they can cherish those memories for long. However, they have plenty of things to deal with. They are confused what to put on to celebrate the occasion. Will help them out? Join Princesses Christmas Photos Album and be prepared to help them make the best photo album ever!

There are three stages to deal with in this brand new dressing game for girls. In the first stage, you will have to browse through their wardrobe and help them to create the perfect Christmas looks. Give your girl a red color upper and then change their hairstyle, nice matching jewelry and combine her look with a matching red color cap! Do not forget to choose an awesome pair of shoes for the girls. Follow the same step for the other princess in this html5 dress up game!

In the second step, you have to take their images in different angles. Take a few images and select the best out of them to create an album in the third stage! You can take four pictures for the album. Take some lovely photos of the both princesses and then create an album by using the photos in this one of the best princess dress-up games! You can also browse through our website and find some more interesting and challenging Christmas games for kids, no download required.
